metadata.name: Revenge
metadata.description:
Introducing the 'Angelo Lagusa' painting, inspired by the main character of 91 Days. 
This one of a kind piece captures the complexity and determination of Angelo as he navigates the dangerous world of organized crime. 
In this scene I wanted to show all the emotions he felt trough all the anime: anger, sadness, guilt, determination, and fear. 
I wanted to put all of this into one painting.
